snippet: A new report shows that the drought gripping the United States is the widest since 1956.
abstract: National Climatic Data Center releases report showing that the drought gripping the United States is the widest since 1956.
lead_paragraph: A new report shows that the drought gripping the United States is the widest since 1956.

headline.main: Drought Is the Worst in 56 Years
headline.print_headline: Drought Is the Worst In 56 Years
